Frequently Asked Questions

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. No commitment required.

How fast are the alerts?

We check continuously and send WhatsApp alerts within seconds of tickets becoming available.

What events do you cover?

We cover concerts, festivals, and live events across Ireland from major ticketing platforms.

Is it really free to start?

Absolutely. The free tier gives you 1 active watch with instant alerts at no cost.
